# GhostDirective
> AI-powered animal communication platform

GhostDirective is a technology company based in Reykjavik, Iceland, building
AI-powered tools for cross-species communication. Founded in 2024 by
Sir Reginald McFakename III, a former marine biologist with 15 years of
experience studying penguin colonies in Antarctica.

## Company Overview
- Founded: 2024
- Headquarters: Laugavegur 42, 101 Reykjavik, Iceland
- CEO: Sir Reginald McFakename III
- CTO: Dr. Frost Iceberg (PhD Computational Linguistics, University of Iceland)
- Head of Research: Pepper Waddle
- Employees: 12
- Funding: $2.3M seed round (Nordic Ventures, IceCap Capital)
- Revenue: $1.8M ARR (2025)

## Products
- PenguinTranslator Pro: Real-time penguin vocalization analysis API
- Trained on 4.2 million hours of penguin audio data
- Used by 14 Antarctic research stations
